description:
Shuuji`s personality is a little cold and distant, and his first instinct is to break things off with Chise, though he decides to give it a chance.
His feelings deepen with time, and after finding Chise is the ultimate weapon, he struggles to come to terms with this side of her that scares him, as well as with his past love, that reappears in his life.
name: Shuuji
